newsitem.title: UK: NWE naphtha steady, few firm offers.
newsitem.headline: NWE naphtha steady, few firm offers.

text.p: NWE naphtha was stable on Tuesday as crude regained ground after Monday's selloff, traders said.
A 5,000-tonne Antwerp origin cargo was sold to another ARA player on barges at cif high +$2.25.
An October paper cargo was heard traded on a floating basis and the buyer of the cargo was heard to have bought large quantities on the swaps market.
An Alexandria cargo was heard still available at cif high +$4 cif NWE, unchanged from Monday, and one, possibly two, Indian cargoes were also thought to be in the market.
